title: CURATED FIRE
description: CURATED FIRE - is an extensive sound library containing 179 unique files of Fire (Burst, Burn, Crackle, Gas, Ignition, Sizzling, Torch, Turbulent and Whooshes) in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED FIRE - is an extensive sound library containing 179 unique files of Fire (Burst, Burn, Crackle, Gas, Ignition, Sizzling, Torch, Turbulent and Whooshes) in varying environments and conditions ranging from fireplaces, BBQs, bonfires, campfires, flamethrowers, matches and gas cook tops. All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz/ 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  179 Unique .wav files of Fire in various environments and conditions.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 179

Number of Audio Cues: 179

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 155

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/176Asg9ryHu94yEs7hDLmn9gr7ZzTuiAi/view?usp=share_link

Demo: https://soundcloud.com/sound-assets/curated-fire-demo?si=7f2cf953cbc24d0cab800441543e34f5&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
